extensionDescription.message: 建立、編輯、及快速切換分頁群組

exportAddonSettingsDescription.message: 將分頁群組匯出為備份檔，以供需要時還原。

importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddonTitle.message: 從 Quicksaver 的 Tab Groups 還原

importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddonDescripti.description: Load a backup file old "Tab Groups" addon.

openGroupAfterChange.message: 切換分頁群組後開啟此分頁群組
openGroupAfterChange.description: Open group after changing to it

searchNotFoundTitle.message: 找不到與 "$search$" 相關的分頁

selectUserGroupIconWarnText.message:
這裡無法載入自訂圖示，而「管理分頁群組」可以。
要開啟「管理分頁群組」嗎？
selectUserGroupIconWarnText.description:
Sorry, you can't load custom icon in this popup, but you can load custom group icon in "Manage groups".
Open "Manage groups"?

catchTabContainers.message: 捕捉並將有內容的分頁移到此分頁群組
catchTabContainers.description: Catch and move tabs with containers to this group

regexpForTabsTitle.message: 捕捉分頁的正規表述式

regexpForTabsHelp.message:
在這裡輸入正規表述式，網址與之相符的分頁會被自動移到此分頁群組。
每行一條規則，可設定多條規則。
例如：
github\.com/drive4ik/simple-tab-groups - 捕捉此套件版本庫的所有頁面
bugzilla\.mozilla\.org - 捕捉 Firefox 錯誤回報的頁面
(facebook|twitter|youtube)\.com - 捕捉社群網站頁面

hotkeysDescription.message:
可以在這裡新增快速鍵。
限制：
1. 這些快速鍵只適用於網頁 (http:, https:)，不適用於瀏覽器頁面 (about:)，因 WebExtension 的 API 不允許。
2. 有些快速鍵在不同的鍵盤配置可能無法運作。例如英文配置下設定的快速鍵 Ctrl + ~ 在俄羅斯文配置下無法運作，因為此按鍵在後者有不同的按鍵碼；在俄羅斯文配置下設定快速鍵 Ctrl +Ё 即可修復此問題。

hotkeyActionTitleLoadNextUnloadedGroup.message: 載入下一個已卸載分頁群組

hotkeyActionTitleLoadPrevUnloadedGroup.message: 載入上一個已卸載分頁群組

hotkeyActionTitleLoadHistoryNextGroup.message: 從歷史資料載入下一個群組

hotkeyActionTitleLoadHistoryPrevGroup.message: 從歷史資料載入上一個群組

hotkeyActionTitleLoadLastGroup.message: 載入最後一個分頁群組

hotkeyActionTitleMoveSelectedTabsToCusto.message: 將所選分頁移至自訂分頁群組

hotkeyActionTitleReloadAllTabsInCurrentG.message: 重新載入自訂群組的全部分頁
hotkeyActionTitleReloadAllTabsInCurrentG.description: Reload all tabs in current group

whatsWrongMessage.message:
出錯囉...

whatsWrongMessage.description:
Whats wrong...
Please contact with developer by support email with last error logs (exist button at bottom of options)

isStickyGroupHelp.description: Tabs in this group will never be automatically moved to another group

ffFailedAndLostDataMessage.description:
FF failed and all the groups were lost.
If you have a backup, you can restore data from it

thisContainerNowIsTemporary.description: This container '$containerName$' has now become temporary

eraseAddonSettingsWarningTitle.message: 完全清除所有已建立群組與設定！分頁不受影響。
eraseAddonSettingsWarningTitle.description:
This action will FULL ERASE all existing settings and groups!
Tabs will not be affected.

deleteAllAddonDataAndSettingsBeforeResto.description: Delete all addon data and settings before restoring backup

helpPageWelcomeV4Title.message: 歡迎使用 Simple Tab Groups v4
helpPageWelcomeV4Title.description: Welcome to Simple Tab Groups v4

helpPageWelcomeV4Description.message:
請啟用瀏覽器設定中的 "回復瀏覽狀態" 功能。
在群組與分頁切換之間需要打開此功能，
否則當打開瀏覽器之後，所有分頁將無法開啟並遺失，套件也會停止執行。
helpPageWelcomeV4Description.description:
Please enable "Restore previous session" in browser settings.
This is necessary to maintain communication between the group and the tab,
otherwise the tabs will not open when the browser starts and will be lost from the addon -
the addon will stop working.

leaveBookmarksOfClosedTabs.message: 在書籤中保留已關閉的分頁(書籤會用分隔號分開)
leaveBookmarksOfClosedTabs.description: Leave bookmarks of closed tabs (bookmarks will separate the separator)

loggingIsAutoEnabledTitle.message: 因插件發生錯誤，已自動啟用除錯訊息紀錄
loggingIsAutoEnabledTitle.description: logging was auto-enabled due to an error in addon

loggingDescription.message:
請在必須紀錄臭蟲及傳送紀錄給我時才啟用這項功能。一旦啟用後會導致插件明顯變慢，因為所有動作及資訊都會被記錄下來。完成問題重現後就請關閉，插件會提示紀錄存檔。此功能可能因插件發生錯誤而自動被啟用。建議關閉此項功能並存檔。
請 Email 紀錄檔給我：drive4ik+stg@protonmail.com
注意！記錄檔不會包含任何個資、密碼、書籤...等資訊！
只會包含重現問題的必要資訊，也才能藉此除錯及修復。
以上

confirmArchiveGroup.message:
確定封存 "$grouptitle$" 群組？
一旦群組被封存，所有分頁資料將被寫入到資料庫內，並從瀏覽器移除。
confirmArchiveGroup.description: Do you want to archive the group

groupIsArchived.message: 無法動作，"$grouptitle$" 群組已被封存
groupIsArchived.description: Unable to complete the action, the group is in the archive

updateAddonToLatestVersion.description: Please, update addon to latest version

hotkeysDescription2.description: You can also configure hotkeys on the Manage extension shortcuts in Firefox page. They will work on all windows and browser pages.

helpPageDbErrorReinstallTitle.message: Simple Tab Groups 資料庫發生錯誤
helpPageDbErrorReinstallTitle.description: Database error in Simple Tab Groups

helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription.message: 很不幸地，STG 套件嘗試從 Firefox 資料庫內讀取設定資料時發生錯誤。此時套件已停止，請照下列步驟繼續使用：
helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription.description: Unfortunately, an error occurred while reading data from the STG addon from the Firefox database. At the moment, the addon is stopped. To resume the add-on, do the following:

helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription2.message: 重啟 Firefox 瀏覽器 (Linux / Mac OS 可直接終止程序)
helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription2.description: Restart Firefox Browser (for Linux and Mac OS with process termination)

helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription3.message: 若重複出現此視窗，請重新安裝套件：
helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription3.description: If you see this window again, try reinstalling the addon:

helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription7.message: 還原存放於 Firefox 下載目錄 "STG-backups" 中的最新一份備份檔。可以從套件設定中還原備份檔
helpPageDbErrorReinstallDescription7.description:
Restore the latest STG addon data backup located in the Firefox downloads folder "STG-backups".
You can restore backup in addon settings

helpPageDbErrorReinstallOpenFFDownloadsF.message: 開啟 Firefox 下載目錄
